description:
A deceitful and murderous husband meets a terrifying end.  A man seeks refuge in a grave and fools a robber.  A thief thinks he`s been killed and sent to paradise.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yotsuya Ghost Story / The Inn in the Grave / The Thief of Paradise
Yotsuya Kaidan / Hakaana no Yado / Gokurako Dorobou
四谷怪談 / 墓穴の宿 / 極楽泥棒
